channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside Look At General Motors Driver Distraction Labs
item.description: Distracted driving costs thousands of lives each year. We were given a rare, inside look at how General Motors test labs are working on ways to reduce...

item.title: Wanting and getting
item.description: Modern marketing culture is designed to amplify our desires. To turn faint wants into desperate needs. As a result, we’re intimately familiar with wha...

item.title: Isn’t It Time We Started To Take Carbon Removal Seriously?
item.description: Much has been written over the years about carbon capture and the role it can play in tackling climate change, what about carbon removal?

item.title: Esports World Cup Expands Club Partner Program To Feature $1m Payouts
item.description: After a successful debut year, the Esports World Cup will now pay out up to $1 million to some clubs accepted into it’s partner program for the 2025 s...

item.title: NASA Just Found Seven More Mysterious ‘Dark Comets’ — What To Know
item.description: A new category of space rock called “dark comets” are proving more common than previously thought, with 14 asteroid-comet objects now discovered.

item.title: What if they’re right?

item.title: Complaints
